mapper.update: update userinfo set compname = #{compname}, compdetail = #{compdetail}, compaddress1 = #{compaddress1}, compaddress2 = #{compaddress2}, compphone = #{compphone} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from gameDetail where writer = #{writer} order by num desc
select title from gamedetail where title = #{title}
mapper.insert: insert into gamedetail (num, title, content, writer, category, price, dcrate, gamefilepath, filepath) values((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from gamedetail), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{price}, #{dcrate}, #{gamefilepath}, #{filepath})
mapper.select: select num from gamedetail where writer = #{writer} and title = #{title}
select count(num) from gamedetail where writer = #{writer}

select refundlist.num, refundlist.id, gamedetail.title, refundlist.updatedate, refundlist.status from refundlist, buylist, gamedetail where refundlist.buynum = buylist.num and buylist.gdnum = gamedetail.num and gamedetail.writer = #{id} order by refundlist.status

select g.num as num, g.title, to_char(gdc.dcstartdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as dcstartdate, to_char(gdc.dcenddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as dcenddate, to_char(gdc.rqstartdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rqstartdate, to_char(gdc.rqenddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rqenddate, gdc.goal, gdc.dcrate from gamedetail g, gamedetaildc gdc where g.num = gdc.gdnum and g.writer = #{writer} order by num desc
mapper.update: update refundlist set status = 'o', refunddate = sysdate where num = #{num}
update refundlist set status = 'x', compcontent = #{inputString}, refunddate = sysdate where num = #{num}
update userinfo set cash = cash + #{buynum} where id = #{id}
update userinfo set cash = cash - #{buynum} * 90 / 100 where id = #{userid}
update userinfo set cash = cash - #{buynum} * 10 / 100 where id = 'cashadmin'
mapper.select: select cash from userinfo where id = #{writer}
mapper.update: update userinfo set cash = cash + (select regicharge from adminsetting) where id = 'cashadmin'
update userinfo set cash = cash - (select regicharge from adminsetting) where id = #{writer}
